title: Building scene layer attribute statistics
description: Concatenated attribute statistics. If needed, the type of the attribute (string or number) may be inferred from `mostFrequentValues` and/or `min`/`max` fields.

label.description: Label of the field name. If label is empty, the label and fieldName are identical.

modelName.description: A fixed string of building information like filter. Used by client applications to define specific behavior for the modelName. Please review the list of [default filter types](defaultFilterTypes.md) that would define the modelName for the attribute statistics.

count.description: Count of elements with the attribute statistics fieldName.

mostFrequentValues.description: Most frequent value, if applicable for this attribute. Truncated to 256 entries.

subLayerIds.description: List of sublayers where this attribute may be found.

examples.title: `String` attribute with `modelName` to specify filterable semantic
`Integral` attribute with `modelName` to specify filterable semantic
